string-array.name: features
string-array.item: was the one of the most great thieves of its dimension
was a mediocre citizen. You were dumb, lazy and ugly
became the richest merchant in the city

string-array.name: death
string-array.item: falling off a cliff trying to reach a coin you saw below to buy beverage. For information only, your liver was grateful to finally die
getting rooted by an ancient tree. You broke your back tripping over one of this tree\'s root and became tetraplegic. The last thing you saw was the tree wrapping you
drowned while diving into the sea. You shouldn\'t have gone into that underwater cave trying to catch that legendary fish
â€¦ nevermind. Your body is still alive. You were abducted by aliens and they made your mind travel through dimensions when, finally, ended landing on you
